ECLIPSE ANDROID PROJECT IMPORT SUMMARY
======================================

Ignored Files:
--------------
The following files were *not* copied into the new Gradle project; you
should evaluate whether these are still needed in your project and if
so manually move them:

From hyp-system:
* build.xml
From joda-time:
* build.xml
* tests/
* tests/java/
* tests/java/net/
* tests/java/net/danlew/
* tests/java/net/danlew/android/
* tests/java/net/danlew/android/joda/
* tests/java/net/danlew/android/joda/test/
* tests/java/net/danlew/android/joda/test/TestDateTimeZone.java
* tests/java/net/danlew/android/joda/test/TestDateUtils.java

Moved Files:
------------
Android Gradle projects use a different directory structure than ADT
Eclipse projects. Here's how the projects were restructured:

In joda-time:
* AndroidManifest.xml => jodatime/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml
* res/ => jodatime/src/main/res/
* src/ => jodatime/src/main/java/
* src/org/joda/time/base/package.html => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/base/package.html
* src/org/joda/time/chrono/package.html => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/chrono/package.html
* src/org/joda/time/convert/package.html => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/convert/package.html
* src/org/joda/time/field/package.html => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/field/package.html
* src/org/joda/time/format/messages.properties => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/format/messages.properties
* src/org/joda/time/format/messages_da.properties => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/format/messages_da.properties
* src/org/joda/time/format/messages_de.properties => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/format/messages_de.properties
* src/org/joda/time/format/messages_en.properties => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/format/messages_en.properties
* src/org/joda/time/format/messages_es.properties => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/format/messages_es.properties
* src/org/joda/time/format/messages_fr.properties => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/format/messages_fr.properties
* src/org/joda/time/format/messages_ja.properties => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/format/messages_ja.properties
* src/org/joda/time/format/messages_nl.properties => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/format/messages_nl.properties
* src/org/joda/time/format/messages_pt.properties => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/format/messages_pt.properties
* src/org/joda/time/format/package.html => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/format/package.html
* src/org/joda/time/overview.html => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/overview.html
* src/org/joda/time/package.html => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/package.html
* src/org/joda/time/tz/package.html => jodatime/src/main/resources/org/joda/time/tz/package.html
In hyp-system:
* AndroidManifest.xml => hypsystem/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml
* res/ => hypsystem/src/main/res/
* src/ => hypsystem/src/main/java/

Next Steps:
-----------
You can now build the project. The Gradle project needs network
connectivity to download dependencies.

Bugs:
-----
If for some reason your project does not build, and you determine that
it is due to a bug or limitation of the Eclipse to Gradle importer,
please file a bug at http://b.android.com with category
Component-Tools.

(This import summary is for your information only, and can be deleted
after import once you are satisfied with the results.)
